headline: LyondellBasell price target lowered to $85 from $97 at Mizuho
summary: Mizuho analyst John Roberts lowered the firm’s price target on LyondellBasell (LYB) to $85 from $97 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. Both LyondellBasell and Dow guided lower for the December quarter, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm points out the polyethylene benchmark contract price settled weaker than expected . Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
